attributes.action: Request that all vehicles with a maximum speed of 20mph be barred from driving at Rush hour
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We request that all slow moving vehicles be banned from using major routes during the hours of 8am-9am and 5pm-6pm. Doing this will allow traffic to flow more smoothly and will also help reduce emissions caused vehicles caught in traffic jams behind slow moving vehicles.
